content: Howdy, Thank you for visiting my blog. I started this blog because I wish to write my thoughts about computer science, statistics, startups, technology products and also some essays and stories. I attempted to blog many years back when i was younger. I ended up deleting my old blog. Currently, i am working on a couple of very exciting projects. You can reach me at ubergeekady [at] gmail.com. Thank you for reading. Aditya
title: About Me
